subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=ぐ
|kanon=こう
|kanyoon=ご
|kun=あと-, うし-ろ, おく-れ, おく-れる, しり-, しり-え, のち-, ゆり-
|nanori=こし, し, しい
}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あと}}

Originally an extension of {{m|ja|跡|tr=ato||footprint; leftover}}, itself a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=あと|足|tr1=a|t1=foot|所|tr2=to|t2=place}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うしろ}}

Probably from {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=うしろ}}.  Usage examples appear in texts from at least the 900s.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>  Ultimate derivation {{unk|ja|sort=うしろ|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おくれ}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|遅れる|tr=okureru||to be late; to be delayed; to come after something else}}.  Examples appear from at least the 1300s.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|しり}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=しり}}.  Ultimate derivation {{unk|ja|sort=しり|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|しりえ}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=しりえ}}.  Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=しりえ|尻|tr1=shiri|t1=butt, tail, rear|方|tr2=e|t2=side, facing, way, direction}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しりえ}}

# the [[rear]], [[back]], or [[backside]] of something
# the [[rearward]] or [[backward]] [[direction]]
# the portion of a [[palace]] where a [[queen]] or other [[female]] [[imperial]] [[consort]] lives

subSections.title: Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|のち}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=のち}}.  Ultimate derivation {{unk|ja|sort=のち|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ゆり}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=ゆり}}.  Ultimate derivation {{unk|ja|sort=ゆり|nocap=1}}.  May be cognate with {{m|ja|より|tr=yori||from; after}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 8
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ご}}

From {{bor|ja|ltc|-|sort=こう}} {{m|zh|後|tr=ɦəuX, ɦəuH||after}}.  Classified as the ''[[唐音#Japanese|tōon]]'' or "Tang sound", so likely borrowed from the dialects spoken during the {{w|Tang dynasty}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 9
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|こう}}
From {{bor|ja|ltc|-|sort=こう}} {{m|zh|後|tr=ɦəuX||after}}.  Classified as the ''[[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]]'', so likely a later borrowing.  Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} reading ''hòu''.

subSections.title: Prefix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|prefix|こう}}

# {{n-g|prefixing element in kanji compounds, adding a meaning of}} [[later]], [[after]], [[following]], [[rearward]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Only used in compounds.  Never used in isolation.
